chapter.title: YASTE Developer
chapter.para: This chapter describes how to quickly get started with YASTE development.

section.title: Install GIT
section.para: Further more its assumed that GIT had been installed. For GIT we recommend the latest Cygwin with the git packages. Please set at least the following variables:
section.programlisting: git config --global user.name "Firstname Secondname" git config --global user.email "my@email.com" git config --global core.autcrlf input

section.para: Finally download Apache Maven and unpack it. Add the path of the maven binary to your PATH variable. Further more you should add a MAVEN_OPTS variable with "-Xmx1024M -XX:MaxPermSize=512m".
